author: Greg Morabito
title: Waitress Refuses Service to 6-Foot Lizard
text: share A massive goanna lizard decided to crash lunch service at the Mimosa Winery restaurant in New South Wales earlier this week, but a courageous server quickly escorted this uninvited guest to the front door . Seriously, this is a case of a restaurant employee going above and beyond the call of duty: Waitress drags out unwanted guest at restaurant The server, Samia Lila, is originally from France and got a job at the Australian winery with a work visa. The 25-year-old tells The Age : “I wasn't scared, I like reptiles so was a bit excited." The incident was caught on camera, and the video was posted to the winery’s Facebook page, where it has now been viewed half a million times. The internet has since given Lilia the nickname Goanna Girl.
